bug.author: SimonBiggs
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
On a fresh install of Python 3.7.7 on Windows 10 installing streamlit alone with pip, the following line causes an the error matplotlib has no attribute use
streamlit/lib/streamlit/bootstrap.py
Line 86 in c2c950d
matplotlib.use("Agg")
I suspect this is because either streamlit itself, or a package streamlit depends upon mocks the matplotlib package if it doesn't happen to be installed there for the import matplotlib doesn't actually raise an ImportError <denchmark-h:h2>Solution</denchmark-h>
To fix, cause a pass to occur if matplotlib doesn't have the use attribute through another except block.
